input.label: Thank you for volunteering to add your hand signs for your native language to the His Hands Reader!
input.hint:
In this form you will add the hand signs for words 1 - 1742.
If you have not already read the ReadMeFirst form… please open and read it now… then come back here and continue to the next page.

select1.label: What is the main country your hand signs are used?

input.label: Your language code is ""
input.hint: You have chosen to enter the "" language. More people sign this languge in than any in other country. For more information about this language go to this link... http://www.ethnologue.com/language/xxx and replace the xxx with the first three letters of your language name " ". For more information about languages spoken in go to this link... http://www.ethnologue.com/language/xx and replace the xx with the first two letters of your country name " "

input.label: The name of the person who volunteered to check the hand signs? (*required)
Checker email
input.hint: e.g. Enter your address as "MyEmail at abc.com" so spammers will not easily retrieve it.

upload.label: Photo of Checker (optional)

input.label: Acknowledge yes/no?
input.hint: Change this to "no" if you do not want your name acknowledged

input.label: Person 1: Name of the person who volunteered to be videod performing his hands signs? [if none write "none" to continue] (*required)
input.hint: By entering my name (Person 1) here, I give permission to have my image/voice/musical/video recordings used by Robert F. Achgill with the His Hands Reader world literacy project for educational purposes. I understand that my image/voice/musical/video recordings will be used to help illustrate and explain text in the His Hands Reader primer text. His Hands Reader primer text with supporting recordings will be distributed for free world wide with the His Hands Reader video lexicon and primers and may also appear in other media forms such as YouTube, or other social video networks and/or Television broadcasts for educational purposes.
